thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: A Willems

author: A Willems
title: A Willems
text:
When shopping expensive products, I shop only when possible paying through paypal. Easy to pay world wide. Paying is free and very fast, within minutes. When seller gives bad performance paypal urgess seller to perform better, and when seller neglect that, full refund is given.
So I feel free to buy anything in China without being afraid of getting no or bad products. So when product is not as described in the webshop you get full refund. My only obligation as customer is reading and understanding product specifications very good. I did 262 buyings at ebay last year. I had about 4 bad experiences with sellers from ebay. But thanks to help of Paypal and ebay, i got full refund in reasonable time.
So top.
